caption.center: IN RE GLENN HARRISON AND MARA HARRISON, Relators.

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Second District, Fort Worth.

opinion.panel: Panel A: LIVINGSTON, J.; CAYCE, C.J.; and HOLMAN, J. HOLMAN, J., not participating.
opinion.opinion_text: The court has considered relators' petition for writ of mandamus and is of the opinion that relief should be denied. Accordingly, relators' petition for writ of mandamus is denied.
